roleset.name: guarantee
roleset.note: VOUCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'vouch' based on sentences in brown. (from vouch.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: snobs
example.text: They visited the shipyards at Brest and [Pierre]-1 had [*-1]to sign the register , [*-1] vouching for the integrity of the visiting foreigner .
example.arg: for the integrity of the visiting foreigner
